definition.text: If at any point the tutorial gets confusing, the Community is ready to help! You don't need to bang your head against the wall!

paragraphs.text: I rely heavily on automated actions that your browser should be able to resolve. For instance, I will take you to places in the Design Space, open up charts in the Charting Space, turn layers on and off, and so on.
If you ever feel your browser is not showing you what I'm suggesting you should be seeing on screen, ask for help!
Use the link below to join the Support Group now!
